contextId.information: This is a merism that refers to the area to the north, and to the south, and all places in between. AT: "in every direction" or "everywhere" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_merism]])
contextId.quote: from the south to the north

contextId.information: This refers to all of Egypt. Where these places are can be stated clearly. AT: "throughout all of Egypt, from Migdol in the north to Syene in the south and the borders of Cush further south" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_merism]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: from the Migdol to Syene and the borders of Cush
